title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 28, 2022, 01:26:51 AMLast edit: July 28, 2022, 02:13:52 AM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! Today we have a piece from my first release, BTC To The Future! v1.0 #089.2018 BTC To The Future! v1.0 Limited Edition Series #089 of 100Tickets:1 - minerjones2 - pinky12343 - pinky12344 - pinky12345 - pinky12346 - pinky12347 - pinky12348 - pinky12349 - pinky12340 - pinky1234a - pinky1234b - pinky1234c - pinky1234d - pinky1234e - pinky1234f - pinky1234General Info: Price Per Ticket:  Pay after half full.Ticket Limit: No limit, take them all if you'd like. Shipping: INCLUDED!! Any Import/VAT taxes paid by winner.Payment: 3QHGvpq5M95L5kjDCrxtFpAVV6V8H6rnLoHow To Play:Pick one or more of the available Tickets slots from the table above. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. Once all Tickets are taken (and paid for) we'll select a future BTC block number. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! Thank You & Good Luck!
